Shockwave/Anubis/Hades:



Anubis and Hades tumble to the ground, reverting to robot modes, firing their 
rifles five times each at Sniper.


---


Shockwave thought for a moment.  "It'll be in my best interests to let this 
event take place." he said, bringing up his targeting scanners and firing 
four seeking missiles off at Sniper.
